member.summary: Specifies the sort direction of the field names.

member.summary: No sorting

member.summary: To sort the field name in ascending.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode
member.summary: Defines whether to allow creating multiple filter conditions for a field in a group or all groups in query builder.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.None
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'None' to disable the unique filter where end-user can create multiple filter conditions for a field option.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.Group
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'Group' to allow the unique filters within a group. Once filter condition is created for a field then user can create filter condition for the same field in next group only.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.All
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'All' to allow unique filters within entire query builder. Once filter condition is created for a field then user can’t create filter condition for the same field in any group.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1
member.summary: Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the id attribute for query builder element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates content for query builder element including HTML and its customizations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AllowValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enables or disables the validation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ColumnTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the template for all columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets CSS class string to customize the appearance of querybuilder.
member.value: Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of querybuilder. The default value is String.Empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the data source of querybuilder.
member.value: Accepts the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the displayMode as Horizontal or Vertical.
member.value: One of the DisplayMode enumeration. The default value is DisplayMode.Horizontal
member.remarks: If the DisplayMode is Horizontal, the columns will be aligned horizontally. If the DisplayMode is Vertical, the columns will be aligned vertically.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnableNotCondition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the not group condition in query builder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the right to left direction option in query builder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the query builder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ImmediateModeDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time delay to trigger the rule change event.
member.value: Accepts double value and the rule change event is triggered after that specified time delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.MatchCase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the grid filtering with exact match.
member.value: true, if the match case is enabled it filters with case sensitive. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.MaxGroupCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum group count or restricts the group count.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Readonly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the user interactions in the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SortDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the sort direction of the field names.
member.value: One of the SortDirection enumeration. The default value is SortDirection.Default
member.remarks: If the SortDirection is Default, the field names will be ordered in default order. If the SortDirection is Ascending, the field names will be ordered in ascending order. If the SortDirection is Descending, the field names will be ordered in descending order.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SummaryView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable filtered query as summary view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the query builder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Separator
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the seprator for complex data binding.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.UniqueFilterMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow creating multiple filter conditions for a field in a group or all groups. Be default, end-user can create multiple filter conditions for a field. The unique filter option for the fields in query builder where once filter condition created for a field then you can prevent creating further conditions in a group or for all groups.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AddGroup(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel,System.String)
member.summary: Adds single or multiple groups, which contains the collection of rules.
member.param: Groups be passed to add the group.
GroupID be be added in the group.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AddRule(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the specified rule into the group which is specified using GroupID parameter.
member.remarks: The rule can be added as group of rules if the IsGroupRule> property is true other wise it is added at the bottom of the group.
member.param: The rule be passed to add the rules.
The groupID to be passed to specify the group to add rules.
To add the rule under the respected group tree.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DeleteGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the group or groups based on the group ID.
member.param: GroupId be passed to delete the group.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DeleteRule(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the rule or rules based on the rule ID.
member.param: RuleId be passed to delete the rule.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetDataManagerQuery(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel)
member.summary: Gets the query for Data Manager.
member.param: Rule be passed to get the query.
member.returns: It returns the data manger Query using the created rule.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetFilteredRecords
member.summary: Gets the filtered records using the created rules.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetGroup
member.summary: Gets the group.
member.returns: It returns the valid rules as RuleModel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetPredicate(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel)
member.summary: Gets the predicate from the created rules.
member.param: Rule be passed to get the predicate.
member.returns: It returns the data manager predicates using the created rule.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetRules
member.summary: Gets the rule or rule collection.
member.returns: It returns the reated rule as RuleModel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetRulesFromSql(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the rules from the sql query.
member.param: SqlString be passed to get the rules.
member.returns: It returns the rule model from the sql query as RuleModel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetSqlFromRules(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the sql query from rules.
member.param: Rule be passed to get the sql rules.
member.returns: It returns the sql query from the RuleModel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetValidRules
member.summary: Gets the valid rule or rules collection.
member.returns: It returns the rule from the created rules as RuleModel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Reset
member.summary: Clears the rules without root rule.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SetRules(System.Collections.Generic.List{Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sets the rule or rules collection.
member.param: Rule be passed to set the rules.
Condition be passed to set the condition.
Not be passed to set the not condition.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SetRulesFromSql(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the rules from the sql query.
member.param: sql string be passed to set the rules.

member.summary: Gets the operators list for given field.
member.param: Fields be passed to get the operators.
member.returns: It returns the collection of operators as OperatorsModel.

member.summary: To update the child properties

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1
member.summary: Used to configure the query builder events.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.OnValueChange
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised before the condition (And/Or), field, operator, value is changed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.Changed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after changing the condition(AND/OR), field, value, operator is changed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after the component is created.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.DataBound
member.summary: Triggers when data source is populated in the Querybuilder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.RuleChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after changing the condition(AND/OR), field, value, operator is changed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.OnActionFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after the data fetch request from the remote server fails.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField
member.summary: A class that represents the field model of SfQueryBuilder component to specify the customized option to the field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize filtering, popup width and height, width of the field dropdown list by specifying value to corresponding property. Remaining necessary properties were added to dropdown list by default.
member.example:
In the below code example, field dropdown list can be customized using tag directive.
<SfQueryBuilder TValue="Employee"> <QueryBuilderField AllowFiltering="true"></QueryBuilderField> <QueryBuilderColumns> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="CustomerID" Label="CustomerID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.String Values="values"> </QueryBuilderColumn> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="EmployeeID" Label="EmployeeID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.Number></QueryBuilderColumn> </QueryBuilderColumns> </SfQueryBuilder>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.AllowFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the filtering option in the field dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the filtering option is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FilterType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the filter type.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is
member.remarks: If the FilterType is StartsWith, the filtering will be performed using starts with operator. If the FilterType is EndsWith, the filtering will be performed using ends with operator. If the FilterType is Contains, the filtering will be performed using contains operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FilterBarPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for filtering option in field dropdown list.
member.value: The filter bar place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Field".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.Placeholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for field dropdown list.
member.value: The place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Field".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.PopupHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates height of field dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup height accepts a string value. The default value is "200px".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.PopupWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of field dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.ShowClearButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the clear button in the field dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the clear button is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of field dropdown list.
member.value: The width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownOpening
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while opening field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using BeforeOpenEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while closing field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownOpened
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after opening field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using PopupEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while filtering on field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the filtering using FilteringEventArgs.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator
member.summary: A class that represents the operator model of "SfQueryBuilder" component to specify the customized option to the operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize filtering, popup width and height, width of the operator dropdown list by specifying value to corresponding property. Remaining necessary properties were added to dropdown list by default.
member.example:
In the below code example, field dropdown list can be customized using tag directive.
<SfQueryBuilder TValue="Employee"> <QueryBuilderOperator AllowFiltering="true"></QueryBuilderField> <QueryBuilderColumns> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="CustomerID" Label="CustomerID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.String Values="values"> </QueryBuilderColumn> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="EmployeeID" Label="EmployeeID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.Number></QueryBuilderColumn> </QueryBuilderColumns> </SfQueryBuilder>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.AllowFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the filtering option in the operator dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the filtering option is enabled in the operator dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.FilterType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the filter type.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is
member.remarks: If the FilterType is StartsWith, the filtering will be performed using starts with operator. If the FilterType is EndsWith, the filtering will be performed using ends with operator. If the FilterType is Contains, the filtering will be performed using contains operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.FilterBarPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for filtering option in operator dropdown list.
member.value: The filter bar place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Operator".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.Placeholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for operator dropdown list.
member.value: The place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Operator".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.PopupHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates height of operator dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup height accepts a string value. The default value is "200px".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.PopupWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of operator dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.ShowClearButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the clear button in the operator dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the clear button is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of operator dropdown list.
member.value: The width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownOpening
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while opening operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using BeforeOpenEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while closing operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownOpened
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after opening operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using PopupEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while filtering on operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the filtering using FilteringEventArgs.
